name: ListUtils_partitionTest
description: Unit tests for the partition functionality of ListUtils.

test_cases.name: testPartition_NormalCase
test_cases.description: Tests the partition functionality of ListUtils with a normal case.

test_cases.name: testPartition_NullList
test_cases.description: Tests the partition functionality of ListUtils with a null list.

test_cases.name: testPartition_InvalidSize
test_cases.description: Tests the partition functionality of ListUtils with invalid partition sizes.
